content:
Let's add a reminder to review your schedule for the next day every evening before bed.

**Wind Down Routine (9:00 PM - 10:00 PM)**

* 9:00 PM - [Insert Wind Down Activity (e.g., reading, relaxation techniques)]
* 9:30 PM - **Review Schedule for Next Day**
* 10:00 PM - Prepare for Bed

**Reminders**

* Set reminders for:
	+ Yoga class (7:40 AM)
	+ Lunch break (12:00 PM)
	+ Prepare for online meeting (1:30 PM, Tuesdays and Thursdays)
	+ Online meeting (Tuesdays and Thursdays, 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM)
	+ Morning tasks (e.g., exercise, meditation)
	+ Work/School tasks (e.g., meetings, deadlines)
	+ Evening tasks (e.g., exercise, hobby)
	+ Wind down routine (e.g., start winding down at 9:00 PM)
	+ Review schedule for next day (9:30 PM)

By reviewing your schedule for the next day, you'll be able to:

* Plan out your tasks and priorities
* Make any necessary adjustments to your schedule
* Feel more prepared and confident for the next day
* Get a good night's sleep knowing you're ready for the next day

Remember to adjust the reminder time according to your specific needs and preferences. If you prefer to review your schedule at a different time, simply adjust the reminder accordingly.
